Class RobotDriveBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.drive.RobotDriveBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MotorSafety
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DifferentialDrive, KilloughDrive, MecanumDrive

    public abstract class RobotDriveBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements MotorSafety
    Common base class for drive platforms.

        public void setMaxOutput(double maxOutput)
        Configure the scaling factor for using RobotDrive with motor controllers in a mode other than PercentVbus.
        Parameters:
        maxOutput - Multiplied with the output percentage computed by the drive functions.

      • applyDeadband

        protected double applyDeadband(double value,
                               double deadband)
        Returns 0.0 if the given value is within the specified range around zero. The remaining range between the deadband and 1.0 is scaled from 0.0 to 1.0.
        Parameters:
        value - value to clip
        deadband - range around zero

      • normalize

        protected void normalize(double[] wheelSpeeds)
        Normalize all wheel speeds if the magnitude of any wheel is greater than 1.0.
